title: Death, Witch of Domination

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Haunt a player. They won't die immediately, but they'll be hit by you after three days. Worst part? They're aware this is happening. They don't know your identity, but **they know you're coming**.
- Dominate over the day phase, ending it immediately. This can only be used **once**. Doesn't matter if someone was about to get hanged, it ends, no questions asked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Coven Heads, and the Coven Leader cannot spawn with you.
- You have Necronomicon Priority.
- Only 1 Coven Head may spawn per game.
- When you gain the **Necromonicon**, your attack is put up a tier...to **Unstoppable**. The haunted players aren't able to vote during the day anymore.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Same as anyone else who is a Coven witch

desc:
Post 1868
*A stalking, hollow shadow. Personification of death.*
